channel.title: Cloud Solutions on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Solutions on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Infobip Logo
Infobip is a Croatian IT and telecommunications company. It operates a full-stack Communications Platform as a Service with private cloud infrastructure and zero-hop connectivity to telecoms globally. Services include A2P SMS messaging, A2P voice, A2P RCS, app notifications, email, chat apps messaging and carrier billing. It serves both mobile network operators and enterprises, notably banks, social networks and corporations, as well as non-profit organisations and public institutions. In 2014 and 2015, the company saw further consolidation of its operations in Latin America and Asia-Pacific.
You can download theInfobiplogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Infobip
item.description: Infobip is a Croatian IT and telecommunications company. It operates a full-stack Communications Platform as a Service with private cloud infrastructure and zero-hop connectivity to telecoms globally. Services include A2P SMS messaging, A2P voice, A2P RCS, app notifications, email, chat apps messaging and carrier billing. It serves both mobile network operators and enterprises, notably banks, social networks and corporations, as well as non-profit organisations and public institutions. In 2014 and 2015, the company saw further consolidation of its operations in Latin America and Asia-Pacific.
